content:
DomainController Class

Definition

The DomainController class represents a domain controller in an Active Directory domain.

In this Article

public class DomainController : System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer
Inheritance
Object
System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer
DomainController

Inherited Members

Dispose()
GetDirectoryEntry()
MoveToAnotherSite(String)
Name
Partitions
ToString()
Equals(Object)
Equals(Object,Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)

Constructors

DomainController()

Initializes a new instance of the DomainController class.

protected DomainController ();

Properties

CurrentTime

Gets the current date and time from this domain controller.

public DateTime CurrentTime { get; }
Value
DateTime

A DateTime object that contains the current date and time from this domain controller.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The current object has been disposed.

Domain

Gets the domain that this domain controller is a member of.

public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain Domain { get; }
Value
Domain

A Domain object that represents the domain that this domain controller is a member of.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The current object has been disposed.

Forest

Gets the forest that this domain controller is a member of.

public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest Forest { get; }
Value
Forest

A Forest object that represents the forest that this domain controller is a member of.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The current object has been disposed.

HighestCommittedUsn

Gets the highest update sequence number that has been committed to this domain controller.

public long HighestCommittedUsn { get; }
Value
Int64

The highest update sequence number (USN) that has been committed to this domain controller.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The current object has been disposed.

InboundConnections

Gets the inbound replication connections for this domain controller.

public override System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnectionCollection InboundConnections { get; }
Value
ReplicationConnectionCollection

A ReplicationConnectionCollection object that contains the inbound replication connections for this domain controller.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The current object has been disposed.

IPAddress

Gets the IP address of this domain controller.

public override string IPAddress { get; }
Value
String

The Internet protocol (IP) address of this domain controller in string form.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The current object has been disposed.

OSVersion

Gets the operating system version of this domain controller.

public string OSVersion { get; }
Value
String

The version of the operating system that is in use on this domain controller.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The current object has been disposed.

OutboundConnections

Gets the outbound replication connections for this domain controller.

public override System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationConnectionCollection OutboundConnections { get; }
Value
ReplicationConnectionCollection

A ReplicationConnectionCollection object that contains the outbound replication connections for this domain controller.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The current object has been disposed.

Roles

Gets the roles that this domain controller serves.

public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryRoleCollection Roles { get; }
Value
ActiveDirectoryRoleCollection

A ActiveDirectoryRoleCollection object that contains a collection of ActiveDirectoryRole members that indicate the roles that this domain controller serves.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The current object has been disposed.

SiteName

Gets the name of the site that this domain controller belongs to.

public override string SiteName { get; }
Value
String

The name of the site that this domain controller belongs to.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The current object has been disposed.

ActiveDirectoryOperationException

The site name was not found.

SyncFromAllServersCallback

Gets or sets the synchronization delegate for this domain controller.

public override System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncUpdateCallback SyncFromAllServersCallback { get; set; }
Value
SyncUpdateCallback

A SyncUpdateCallback delegate that will be used for synchronization notifications.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The current object has been disposed.

Methods

CheckReplicationConsistency()

Uses the Knowledge Consistency Checker (KCC) to verify the replication topology for this domain controller.

public override void CheckReplicationConsistency ();
Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

UnauthorizedAccessException

The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.

Dispose(Boolean)

Causes the object to release all managed and/or unmanaged resources.

protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
disposing
Boolean

Determines if the managed resources should be released. trueif the managed resources are released; otherwise, false.

Remarks

The disposing parameter affects only the release of the managed resources. The unmanaged resources are always released by this method.

EnableGlobalCatalog()

Promotes this domain controller to a global catalog server.

public virtual System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalog EnableGlobalCatalog ();
Returns
GlobalCatalog

A GlobalCatalog object that represents the global catalog server.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The current object has been disposed.

Remarks

The DisableGlobalCatalog method is used to demote the domain controller from a global catalog server.

Finalize()

Overrides the stem.Object.Finalize* method.

~DomainController ();

FindAll(DirectoryContext)

Finds all domain controllers in the specified context.

public static System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainControllerCollection FindAll (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context);
context
DirectoryContext

A DirectoryContext object that contains the target and credentials to use for the search. The target of this DirectoryContext object is the name of the domain that will be searched for domain controllers.

Returns
DomainControllerCollection

A DomainControllerCollection object that contains the domain controllers found by the search.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

context is null.

ArgumentException

context is not valid.

FindAll(DirectoryContext,String)

Finds all domain controllers in the specified context and site.

public static System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainControllerCollection FindAll (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string siteName);
context
DirectoryContext

A DirectoryContext object that contains the target and credentials to use for the search.

siteName
String

The name of the site to search for domain controllers.

Returns
DomainControllerCollection

A DomainControllerCollection object that contains the domain controllers that were found by the search.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

context or siteName is null.

FindOne(DirectoryContext)

Finds a single domain controller in the specified context.

public static System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController FindOne (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context);
context
DirectoryContext

A DirectoryContext object that contains the target and credentials to use for the search.

Returns
DomainController

A DomainController object that represents the domain controller that was found by the search.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryObjectNotFoundException

No domain controller was found.

ArgumentNullException

context is null.

FindOne(DirectoryContext,LocatorOptions)

Finds a single domain controller in the specified context, allowing for additional search options.

public static System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController FindOne (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.LocatorOptions flag);
context
DirectoryContext

A DirectoryContext object that contains the target and credentials to use for the search.

flag
LocatorOptions

A combination of one or more of the LocatorOptions members that defines the type of domain controller to find.

Returns
DomainController

A DomainController object that represents the domain controller that was found by the search.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryObjectNotFoundException

No domain controller was found.

ArgumentException

context or flag is not valid.

ArgumentNullException

context is null.

FindOne(DirectoryContext,String)

Finds a single domain controller in the specified context and site.

public static System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController FindOne (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string siteName);
context
DirectoryContext

A DirectoryContext object that contains the target and credentials to use for the search.

siteName
String

The name of the site to search for a domain controller.

Returns
DomainController

A DomainController object that represents the domain controller that was found by the search.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryObjectNotFoundException

No domain controller was found.

ArgumentException

context or siteName is not valid.

ArgumentNullException

context or siteName is null.

FindOne(DirectoryContext,String,LocatorOptions)

Finds a single domain controller in the specified context and site, allowing for additional search options.

public static System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController FindOne (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string siteName, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.LocatorOptions flag);
context
DirectoryContext

A DirectoryContext object that contains the target and credentials to use for the search.

siteName
String

The name of the site to search for a domain controller.

flag
LocatorOptions

A combination of one or more of the LocatorOptions members that defines the type of domain controller to find.

Returns
DomainController

A DomainController object that represents the domain controller that was found by the search.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryObjectNotFoundException

No domain controller was found.

ArgumentException

context, siteName, or flag is not valid.

ArgumentNullException

context or siteName is null.

GetAllReplicationNeighbors()

Retrieves the replication neighbors for this domain controller.

public override System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationNeighborCollection GetAllReplicationNeighbors ();
Returns
ReplicationNeighborCollection

A ReplicationNeighborCollection object that contains the replication neighbors for this domain controller.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

UnauthorizedAccessException

The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.

GetDirectorySearcher()

Retrieves a DirectorySearcher object for the domain controller.

public virtual System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher GetDirectorySearcher ();
Returns
DirectorySearcher

A DirectorySearcher object for the domain controller.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The current object has been disposed.

GetDomainController(DirectoryContext)

Retrieves a DomainController object for the specified context.

public static System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainController GetDomainController (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context);
context
DirectoryContext

A DirectoryContext object that contains the target and credentials to use to retrieve the object. The target of this context must be a domain controller.

Returns
DomainController

A DomainController object that represents the domain controller that was found.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryObjectNotFoundException

A connection to the target specified in context could not be made.

ArgumentNullException

context is null.

ArgumentException

context is not valid.

GetReplicationConnectionFailures()

Retrieves a list of the replication connection failures recorded by this domain controller.

public override System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationFailureCollection GetReplicationConnectionFailures ();
Returns
ReplicationFailureCollection

A ReplicationFailureCollection object that contains the replication connection failures that were recorded by this domain controller.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

UnauthorizedAccessException

The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.

GetReplicationCursors(String)

Retrieves the replication cursor information for the specified partition.

public override System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationCursorCollection GetReplicationCursors (string partition);
partition
String

The distinguished name of the partition for which to retrieve the replication cursor information.

Returns
ReplicationCursorCollection

A ReplicationCursorCollection that contains the replication cursor information.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ArgumentNullException

partition is null.

ArgumentException

partition is an empty string.

ObjectDisposedException

The current object has been disposed.

UnauthorizedAccessException

The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.

GetReplicationMetadata(String)

Retrieves the replication metadata for a specific Active Directory Domain Services object.

public override System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryReplicationMetadata GetReplicationMetadata (string objectPath);
objectPath
String

The path to the object for which to retrieve the replication metadata.

Returns
ActiveDirectoryReplicationMetadata

A ActiveDirectoryReplicationMetadata object that contains the replication metadata for the specified object.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ArgumentNullException

objectPath is null.

ArgumentException

objectPath is not valid.

ObjectDisposedException

The current object has been disposed.

UnauthorizedAccessException

The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.

GetReplicationNeighbors(String)

Retrieves the replication neighbors for the specified partition.

public override System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationNeighborCollection GetReplicationNeighbors (string partition);
partition
String

The distinguished name of the partition for which to retrieve the replication neighbors.

Returns
ReplicationNeighborCollection

A ReplicationNeighborCollection object that contains the replication neighbors for this object.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ArgumentNullException

partition is null.

ArgumentException

partition is not valid.

ObjectDisposedException

The current object has been disposed.

UnauthorizedAccessException

The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.

GetReplicationOperationInformation()

Retrieves the current and pending replication operations for this domain controller.

public override System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationOperationInformation GetReplicationOperationInformation ();
Returns
ReplicationOperationInformation

A ReplicationOperationInformation object that contains the current and pending replication operations.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ObjectDisposedException

The object has been disposed.

UnauthorizedAccessException

The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.

IsGlobalCatalog()

Determines if this domain controller is a global catalog server.

public virtual bool IsGlobalCatalog ();
Returns
Boolean

true if this domain controller is a global catalog server or false otherwise.

Exceptions
ObjectDisposedException

The current object has been disposed.

SeizeRoleOwnership(ActiveDirectoryRole)

Causes this domain controller to take ownership of the specified role.

public void SeizeRoleOwnership (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryRole role);
role
ActiveDirectoryRole

One of the ActiveDirectoryRole members that specifies which role the domain controller should take ownership of.

Exceptions
InvalidEnumArgumentException

role is not valid.

ObjectDisposedException

The current object has been disposed.

Remarks

This method is a destructive operation because it causes the role to be taken without the cooperation of the server that currently holds the role. The TransferRoleOwnership method should be used instead whenever possible.

SyncReplicaFromAllServers(String,SyncFromAllServersOptions)

Causes this domain controller to synchronize the specified partition with all other domain controllers.

public override void SyncReplicaFromAllServers (string partition, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SyncFromAllServersOptions options);
partition
String

The distinguished name of the partition for the domain controller to synchronize.

options
SyncFromAllServersOptions

A combination of one or more of the SyncFromAllServersOptions members.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

partition is null.

ArgumentException

partition is not valid.

ObjectDisposedException

The current object has been disposed.

SyncFromAllServersOperationException

An error occurred in the synchronization operation.

Remarks

By default, the replication will only occur with the other domain controllers in the same site. If the options parameter contains the SyncFromAllServersOptions value, then the replication will occur with all domain controllers in the forest.

SyncReplicaFromServer(String,String)

Causes this domain controller to synchronize the specified partition with the specified domain controller.

public override void SyncReplicaFromServer (string partition, string sourceServer);
partition
String

The distinguished name of the partition with which to synchronize the domain controller.

sourceServer
String

The name of the server with which to synchronize the partition.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ArgumentNullException

partition or sourceServer is null.

ArgumentException

partition or sourceServer is not valid.

ObjectDisposedException

The current object has been disposed.

UnauthorizedAccessException

The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.

TransferRoleOwnership(ActiveDirectoryRole)

Causes ownership of the specified role to be transferred to this domain controller.

public void TransferRoleOwnership (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryRole role);
role
ActiveDirectoryRole

One of the ActiveDirectoryRole members that specifies which role will be transferred to this domain controller.

Exceptions
InvalidEnumArgumentException

role is not valid.

ObjectDisposedException

The current object has been disposed.

TriggerSyncReplicaFromNeighbors(String)

Begins a synchronization of the specified partition.

public override void TriggerSyncReplicaFromNeighbors (string partition);
partition
String

The distinguished name of the partition to synchronize.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ActiveDirectoryServerDownException

The target server is either busy or unavailable.

ArgumentNullException

partition is null.

ArgumentException

partition is not valid.

ObjectDisposedException

The current object has been disposed.

UnauthorizedAccessException

The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.
